name: Tri-valley, INC
specialty: Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Tri-valley, INC is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Dudley, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $30.8M in Medicaid payments across 299K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $30.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
